amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-320 to strike the term "aware of" included in the bill and replaces with the term "using".
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the term "aware of" included in the bill and replaces with the term "using".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 648).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 648).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
